content: Would you like to sell on one of the biggest games markeplace without ANY limits?Access their wholesale offersSkip any verification process they requireAccess to G2A's APIEnjoy much lower feesNever get your auctions limited againBe able to withdraw in BTCG2A is the best place to sell digital keys at the moment. Their pending period is the lowest (being 14 days) and they send out payouts fast.Also they are the most popular cd-key marketplace at the moment, getting more traffic than any other!Currently without G2A's Business Verification, sellers there can sell only up to 1000 Euro.Well I can help you get pass that with my G2A Seller Verified Accounts.Price: $200 BTC or ETHIf you have any questions feel free to PM me.
